TEXT.S:
Al-Farouq Aminu
siwkay niza Al-Farouq Aminu (9 a bulad 21 a demiad, 1991 a mihcan nalecuhan), tatama, lumeniay a tademaw. miunduay, u kanas-mali a mimaliay nu Amilika NBA. namakay Nayciliya a kanatal, micumud tu ku Amilika kanatal-mueneng.
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika -Â·:Al-Farouq Aminu1990921-NBA2010NBA18 Al-Farouq Ajiede Aminu (born September 21, 1990) is a Nigerian-American professional basketball player for the Portland Trail Blazers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He plays internationally with the Nigeria national basketball team. Aminu was selected by the Los Angeles Clippers in the 2010 NBA draft with the eighth overall pick.
kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu
